doc:
James Lindsay (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Lindsay_(actor) 0 Robert Lindsay Stevenson (born 13 December 1949), known professionally as Robert Lindsay, is an English actor. He is known for his stage and television work, including appearances with the Royal Shakespeare Company and in musical theatre, and his roles as Wolfie Smith in Citizen Smith, Captain Pellew in Hornblower, and Ben Harper in My Family. He has won a BAFTA, a Tony Award, and three Olivier Awards for his work. Robert_Lindsay_Stevenson ( born_13_December_1949 ) , known professionally as Robert_Lindsay , is an_English_actor . He is_known for his_stage_and_television_work , including appearances with the_Royal_Shakespeare_Company and in musical_theatre , and his_roles as Wolfie_Smith in Citizen_Smith , Captain_Pellew in Hornblower , and Ben_Harper in My_Family . He has_won a_BAFTA , a_Tony_Award , and three_Olivier_Awards for his_work .
